address: Xã Long Sơn, Thành phố Vũng Tàu, Tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Long Sơn"**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative location for "Xã Long Sơn, Thành phố Vũng Tàu, Tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu". My first step is to break down the old address and confirm the Province ("Tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu") and the specific ward ("Xã Long Sơn"). With that information in mind, I'll go through the relevant resolutions to see if there's been any change.

First, I examined Resolution 60-NQ/TW regarding provincial reorganization. It's clear that "Tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu" has been merged into "Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh." So, "Xã Long Sơn" is now under the jurisdiction of "Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh" at the provincial level.

Next, I thoroughly inspected other resolutions looking for changes affecting "Xã Long Sơn". I was mindful that any change would likely reference either "Tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu" or the new "Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh." I carefully reviewed each of the provided resolutions, specifically noting any mention of "Xã Long Sơn".

*   I checked resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, but it only discussed "phường Long Sơn," not the "xã" I was interested in. It also pertained to An Giang Province, so I dismissed it.
*   Similarly, resolutions 1658/NQ-UBTVQH15 (Bắc Ninh), 1660/NQ-UBTVQH15 (Đắk Lắk), 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15 (Lâm Đồng), and 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15 (Quảng Ngãi) included "xã Long Sơn" but were all in the wrong provinces, making them irrelevant to the search.
*   Resolution 1678/NQ-UBTVQH15 concerning Nghệ An had mentions of "xã Long Sơn", but again, these were not within the target province.

Having systematically reviewed all the provided resolutions, I've determined that none of them explicitly address a reorganization or renaming of "Xã Long Sơn" within the context of the merger into "Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh." Therefore, *my conclusion is that "Xã Long Sơn" remains under the jurisdiction of "Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh", with no change at the ward level as a result of the resolutions examined*. It is possible that further research might reveal relevant local resolutions specific to Vũng Tàu, but that's outside the scope of the given resources.

citation.header: 1685/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
citation.line: 164. Sau khi sắp xếp, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh có 168 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã, gồm 113 phường, 54 xã và 01 đặc khu; trong đó có 112 phường, 50 xã, 01 đặc khu hình thành sau sắp xếp quy định tại Điều này và 05 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã không thực hiện sắp xếp là phường Thới Hòa, các xã Long Sơn, Hòa Hiệp, Bình Châu, Thạnh An.
